titles: A congratulation on the happy discovery of the hellish fanatick plot. To the tune of Now, now the the fight's done.
publisher: Printed by Nat. Thompson next the Cross-Keys in Fetterlane,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
